txt.en:
'The text you recovered told of a goblin warrior, a champion of Angmar that commanded a legion of his kind.

'Is this a legend of old or are these the words of truth? That I cannot say, but this Mordirith's servants are many and powerful...I do not doubt these claims.

'You should investigate the matter. Return to Minas Maur and strike its gates. Should this fabled champion exist, it would be ill-advised to ignore such a challenge.'
'The goblins are a craven lot, vicious and evil. Their champion was no less despicable, but by your accounting, it seems he was a formidable opponent.'
'That text you hold should summon the goblin champion.'
Lindir translated the text you found from the Black Speech into Westron.
Summon and defeat Minas Maur's Champion
Minas Maur stands on the western side of Barad Gularan, south of Gath Forthn√≠r.\n\nYou must travel to Barad Gularan and issue a challenge to the goblins within Minas Maur.

Lindir is in the Fire Hall in Rivendell in the Trollshaws, far to the south.\n\nYou travelled to Minas Maur and called out its champion. After a difficult battle, you defeated the creature. You should return to Lindir with the news of your victory.
